name: Abandoned Cart
headline: Send e-mail notifications for users who left an abandoned cart without finish the purchase.
overview: This application allows the store to send e-mails to the consumers, reminding them that they have a pending cart. This enhances the conversion rate for the store and increases the client fidelity. This app it's a service which will be monitoring to send emails to customers who left abandoned carts.
features: Allows sending of e-mails for abandoned carts automatically
Contribute to increase the conversion rate
